tool_description: Gets all NFT collections that match a given metadata search in +20 networks and including testnets.
name: NFT Explorer
title: NFT Explorer

api_list.name: NFTSearch
api_list.description: Get NFTs that match a given metadata search in all widely used networks

required_parameters.name: filter
required_parameters.description:
- To look into the entire metadata set the value to '*global*'. 
- To have a better response time you can look into a specific field like '*name*'

required_parameters.name: offset
required_parameters.description: Pagination index. Default is set to 0

required_parameters.name: chain
required_parameters.description:
The chain to query:
- eth
- bsc
- avalanche
- polygon
- 0x1
- kovan
- avalanche testnet
- bsc testnet
- mumbai
- ropsten
- 0x3
- 0x4
- goerli
